# 2026 Artificial Intelligence Internship & New Grad Positions

<p align="center">
<a href="https://circleci.com/gh/gjbae1212/hit-counter"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/614%20Jobs-6366F1"></a>
</p>


This repository is a comprehensive list of AI/ML & Data Science jobs for college students in search of **internships** or **new graduate** positions. The positions are updated daily, and we prioritize jobs posted within the last 120 days.

### USA Positions :eagle:
- [Internships :books:](/) - **109** available ([FAANG+](#faang), [Quant](#quant), [Other](#other))
- [New Graduate :mortar_board:](/NEW_GRAD_USA.md) - **142** available ([FAANG+](/NEW_GRAD_USA.md#faang), [Quant](/NEW_GRAD_USA.md#quant), [Other](/NEW_GRAD_USA.md#other))

### International Positions :globe_with_meridians:
- [Internships :books:](/INTERN_INTL.md) - **157** available ([FAANG+](/INTERN_INTL.md#faang), [Quant](/INTERN_INTL.md#quant), [Other](/INTERN_INTL.md#other))
- [New Graduate :mortar_board:](/NEW_GRAD_INTL.md) - **206** available ([FAANG+](/NEW_GRAD_INTL.md#faang), [Quant](/NEW_GRAD_INTL.md#quant), [Other](/NEW_GRAD_INTL.md#other))
